website_summaries.verdict: Bright, versatile, and adjustable. Hard-wired reliability is also a plus. Heavy weather could impact the light’s operation, however.
pros: Motion sensor sensitivity can be quickly set with rotating dial
cons: Installation can be problematic with older wiring systems
Some reports of fixture failure after heavy rain

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on full time, very poor functional design
customer_reviews.text: Can't turn on full time. I have it in my driveway and turned on my old security light full time to play basketball at night or if questionable activity was happening. This unit does not stay on, only stays on the timed amount. I have owned many motion activated security lights and all of them allowed you to keep the light on full time. I made the incorrect assumption that this light would do the same, I was wrong. I would love to return it but it's fifteen feet off the ground and it is now winter.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W

customer_reviews.title: Good when working
customer_reviews.text: Pros- The light is bright and the sensor works well Cons- One of the heads filled halfway with water and no longer works after 5 weeks. Pro- Just spoke with customer service, to a rep that actually spoke English and he promised to send a new unit in 3-5 days Con- Not knowing how long the new one will last.
customer_reviews.author: Ford 2110`

customer_reviews.title: Light sensor is defective and others owners have the same problem...
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple of defective units to start but it looks like they updated the product and it now works fine. I have had this installed for about a month it does not pick up an false movements like the old one did. I do recommend this now.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Did ok at first but now it just clicks on randomly. The light is good but the controller is flakey.
customer_reviews.author: Bocamo

customer_reviews.title: Would be great, if it worked properly.
customer_reviews.text: This light constantly goes on and off in approximately 10 second intervals. I've verified that it's not in test mode, and tried fiddling with the controls in every possible manner, including override mode, and it still goes on and off. Otherwise, looks nice, easy to install... but ultimately useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sconnie

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a week
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted a week, went out after the first heavy rain, now they only make a clicking sound. Definitely water got into the motion sensor box. I was so happy at first that I was about to buy a second pair but good thing I didn't. Very disappointed with this product which is meant for outdoor use... Update #2 October 2017 After the refund was completed the actual company reached out and offered a replacement free of charge. The replacement has been working as it should for about 5 weeks and made it thru hurricane rain. Changing rating from 1 star to 5 stars Update#3 April 2019 The replacement given by the still working like new!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Comes on in daylight! A waste
customer_reviews.text: I returned the first one that I bought because it activated 24 hours a day, for any movement detected. Day or night. This replacement does the same thing, no matter what settings you use. Waste of money. Update.... after several months, and adjusting and readjusting the settings, atop a 16 foot extension ladder no less, it seems to be working better. I have 2 other double head motion lights around my property. They always work perfectly with no false day lighting. And, they are brighter with a whiter light. I'm still disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Texas softball dad

customer_reviews.title: Keeps turning on for no reason.....
customer_reviews.text: First off, it wasn’t even this product, the settings only has 2 switches... I tried it anyway... it keeps triggering on for no reason, I don’t see anything triggering the lights, and it goes on and off... on and off all night long... how is this supposed to save me money on electric? Terrible product... buyer beware..
customer_reviews.author: tommy

customer_reviews.title: Worthless Chinese junk. The main screw wouldn't go through ...
customer_reviews.text: Worthless Chinese junk. The main screw wouldn't go through the holder. It went into the trash. Will go to a brick and mortar store and purchase something else so if that is full of junk, I can take it back same day. Update: I went to home depot and bought a defender. It cost a bit more, but had a sold backing for mounting rather than a weird piece of material on it and all parts fit right. Still made in China, but better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay

customer_reviews.title: Motion sensitivity is a dud.
customer_reviews.text: This light would be great, except you can't adjust sensitivity to motion. Ours seems to be sensitive in fits and starts, maybe related to the weather. Some nights it stays on all night, and other nights it works as expected. Also, it took FOREVER to dial in the timer. The dial does not seem to be a linear control... maybe more like exponential. If I wanted this as a dusk-to-dawn or always-on timer without motion activation, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality! Motion sensor only senses half of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality! Motion sensor only senses half of the distance. Left LED module died 2 days after outside temperature fell below 30degrees.
customer_reviews.author: dml

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, very bright.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this motion sensor light on the side of my house, to replace an old halogen motion light. I was immediately impressed with the solid build quality and installation was a breeze with the enclosed hardware, which was of equally good quality, and included everything needed. Set up was simple and straight forward and the lights are indeed very bright, more than adequate to flood the entire side of my house and driveway with bright white light. I would definitely buy it again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalCanuck

customer_reviews.title: Zero issues with "visitors" after installing.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my father. He's always parked his truck in the rear driveway but was recently losing a tank of gas weekly. This light is an extremely bright white and we were (possibly lucky) able to set the range so that it was a full 180 degrees, that activated exactly where the driveway met the road. It's about 40' from the light, fyi
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye78

customer_reviews.title: High Performance and Unequalled Customer Service as a BONUS!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these for the corners of my house under the eaves, as most people would.They have worked flawlessly for 2 years with far fewer false alarms than any I've used before. One failed. Hyperikons' Customer Support answered my email/ticket within 1 day and had a replacement on the way in 2 days. THAT'S the way to do it. Thanks, Hyperikon!
customer_reviews.author: Max C Cichon

customer_reviews.title: Motion detector is unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these lights installed for almost 5 months now. The lights seem to have a mind of their own and will turn on and off at random. The lights often will not turn on when I pull the car into the driveway. I've adjusted the sensitivity and the motion detector many times without any improvement. The small red light that is on the motion detector is supposed to flash but it never has. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Allworkandnoplay

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Motion sensor is very poor. Only triggers in few spots. Can stand right in front of it 8ft away and it won't trigger. If this worked I would like the product. Looks nice, shines nice but doesn't respond to motion. I have range sensor all the way up!
customer_reviews.author: troubleshooter

customer_reviews.title: Bright light, not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Installed on the day it arrived. Worked great on the first night. Today it rained and one light got water in inside after a few hours of rain. Update: I contacted customer service, they have promptly sent a new light out, however I got a similar response as one of the top reviews that there is a 0.5% fall out rate of light that are not water proof. Customer service did not answer my question and instead provided a stock answer. After I go through the trouble of changing out the light I will update again. It wants to be a good production, but water intrusion is not good for an outdoor light.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: One light quit working in less than a week. Update- I was contacted by the manufacturer. They supplied me with a new light. After several months the light is working fine. Customer service is top notch. I would buy this product again after their support. Update: the third light has quit working and they wont stand behind it. I will buy from another mfg.
customer_reviews.author: todd

customer_reviews.title: Flashing on D-T-D
customer_reviews.text: Update, I’m going to remove this thing and go buy another one from Home Depot. This thing is flaky at best. At the end of the day, it is a waste of energy to try to make it work correctly. I feel like this fixture is made fairly well. It’s a nice looking device. However, I’ve tried everything I can to get it to come on and stay on all night long without flashing but have had no luck. It comes on as dusk sets in and will stay on for various amounts of time but it always flashes off and on at least every ~3 minutes. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Octagetti

customer_reviews.title: It Works As Expected
customer_reviews.text: I needed a motion like that had an adjustable photo sensor. The unit I replaced was mounted under the soffit and everything set it off all day long. The point of these lights is to have them only respond to motion when it's dark. Well this one does exactly that! We now have a front porch light that comes on when approaching the door or when leaving but only when it's dark. Thanks to a US company for well designed and produced product.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Peck

customer_reviews.title: Worst light ever!
customer_reviews.text: Worst light I’ve ever had. No rhyme or reason to when it goes off or stays on. Stays on a long time during the day when I don’t need light. At night it will stay on for as little as 5 seconds to maybe a minute. Very frustrating. I paid to have it installed and hate to pay again to have it removed and a new one installed but guess I’ll have to. Not sure how long it was set to stay on for but I’m sure it wasn’t 15 seconds!
customer_reviews.author: mlp

customer_reviews.title: Very nice security light but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this light but there is a problem with installation. The indentation for where the bolt goes to secure the light is barely larger than the bolt head! Because of that, I couldn't use a socket to tighten the bolt. I had to use 'needle nose' pliers and slowly turn the bolt until it was finally tight enough. It would have made installation so much easier (and faster) if they had just increased the size of the indentation where the bolt goes.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Needed an outdoor, waterproof, motion-sensor security light that looked good and not like something from the starship enterprise. This little gem fits the bill and is substantially cheaper than those found in the "big box" stores. I particularly like the solid metal construction and powder-coated finish. Very easy to install. Also lights are easily adjusted as are the controls conveniently located under the base of the sensor. Works like a charm and I highly recommend it ... you won't go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.author: J. Fountain

customer_reviews.title: Junk fixture! Replaced by Hyperikon.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this twice; first one had a bad sensor. Second one only one lamp lighted; returned. Very nice advertising for a poor product. Yuk. Customer service replaced the fixture with one that works fine. I installed it, tested it, and now enjoying the security lighting that it provides. The customer service rep: Ariadna , was very helpful and efficient in supplying the replacement. Hopefully it lasts many years.
customer_reviews.author: BONES

customer_reviews.title: Bright Light but the directions are lacking
customer_reviews.text: I installed this light 1 week ago to replace an existing Halogen exterior flood. Installation went okay. The problem I'm having is the adjustment of the settings. No matter how I change the settings it seems to be on almost constantly. It is set to Auto (motion) but I have played with the head & timing and it still is on almost constantly. Not sure if I'm going to keep it or not. -Finally found the issue. The function switch which I thought was in the middle (very hard to tell) was not so I adjusted that and now the light works fine. Nice and bright. I'll see how it does through the Northeast winter.
customer_reviews.author: MR Dave

customer_reviews.title: I love this LED light
customer_reviews.text: I usually never write a review for the products i buy. but for this I thought its worth it. I love LED lights, i want LEDs everywhere. And these LEDs are the brightest i bought so far. These lights light up the whole street in front of my house and the sensor has a really good range. One of the LED light is lose, even tho i tight it as hard as possible, gravity pulls it down. But its fine because its bright enough to light up the sidewalk even facing down. Hooking up the light was rather easy. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who wants extra security for their house.
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: Very good sensor light.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality sensor light system for the price. Easy to adjust sensitivity, range, and length of time the light stays on when it senses movement. Test function makes adjustment simple. All materials needed for installation are included except the silicone for final sealing. The only reason I did not give this product 5 stars is because the installation instructions are in very small and very light print. Although this is a relatively minor point, it seems it would be easy to use a larger and darker font to eliminate this issue. When I was finally able to read them, installation took only about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Razz Berry

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking light
customer_reviews.text: I installed it the back of the house so it would give us light on the sidewalk along the house to the back door. I already installed one of your bigger dusk to dawn LED light on the side of the house to light up the cement pad between the house and garage. Works great. The double light LED sure could use a picture of the bottom of the light to adjust the settings. I had to go on line to your site and make a copy of the settings. Still trying different settings to get it right for the location. Most likely get another double LED light for the back door. Nice to have motions sensors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: The built quality is very good and robust for the price. However, tested extensively the motion sensing part of the light for 1 hour to produce reproducible results where the light would trip around the same area, but came up with mixed results all over the place. I’ve installed many types of motion security lights in the past, but never a light with this much variation in results. Maybe I got a faulty product?
customer_reviews.author: Smokytriscuit

customer_reviews.title: Great light fixture.
customer_reviews.text: Right off... I'd give this a 5-star rating but for one little thing that didn't seem to work. The install went smoothly, but when all was said and done the power was re-applied. I tried making my personalized settings sensitivity, etc. but, when it came to adjusting the LUMs I did not notice any change in the light output from either the hi end or the low end. Other than that, the fixture itself seems to be really well made, and even with that one little issue, I am considering buying 1 more for the other end of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Len Pik

customer_reviews.title: Great light for 2 years now
customer_reviews.text: I use this light as the one at my front door. I set it turn itself on when it's dark and stay on all night. I have used it for a full two years without any issues! Recently, it started flickering on and off every once in awhile and I read from other reviews that it's a sign that the LEDs are about to die out. I contacted the seller and they instantly honored their 5 year warranty! Great product and great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Impulse Shopper

customer_reviews.title: When it worked it was great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these two for a customer's house because the one I bought a while ago for my house worked so well. To my surprise the passive feature stopped working after two weeks of being on her house. I hope they will contact me for a return or replacement. Other then that I like the light it puts out and the range adjustment it has.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: It’s cheap
customer_reviews.text: The dials just spin in a circle and never stop. It’s super cheap, but it’s installed, so I’m just going to ride it out until it dies or water inevitably gets in the lens like the other reviews. The electrical wires were super thin. My wire nuts just shredded them instead of tightening. I feel like all of these off brand ones on Amazon will be the same junk no matter which one you get. Next time I’ll buy the brand name Chinese junk so I can get a mid- grade light. Haha!
customer_reviews.author: Asv

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright
customer_reviews.text: I've had this only about a week or so and so far I love it. The brightness of the LEDs is fantastic. The range is a bit finicky to adjust, however. If I turn it all the way up and the flag flutters on my flag pole completely on the opposite side of my 2 car driveway the light comes on. If the range is halfway up then it doesn't pick up anything beyond the first half of the drive. Still playing around with it, but as far as the sensitivity of the motion detection, it is better than the last light we had out there. Overall, I really like this.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: My electrician installed this and it worked correctly for about a week, and then stayed on all the time and only went off if I turned off the switch. It suddenly stopped working completely. It took a while for my electrician to get back to me but today told me it was just "bad". Ugh! What a waste of time and money! I went to Lowes and purchased one that was less expensive but still had to pay for two installations. UPDATE: The company very quickly issued a refund. No hassles and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: They do illuminate a nice bright blue light, however that's the only good thing I can say..motion sensor doesn't work most of the time..other times one of the lights just comes on and won't go off..I had to pay $50 to have this junk installed only to pay another $50 to put up new ones once I return these worthless lights...surprised they are still selling this subpar project as 4 star item
customer_reviews.author: K. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great LED flood light.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of the LED lighting technology, especially the 5000-6000K range. I wanted a flood light for the backyard so I purchased this in hopes it will mean all my needs. After installing this on my garage, which was fairly simple, I turned it on and was very pleased with the results. It is BRIGHT and the lighting range is very good. My only issue is during backyard movie/sports nights, I have to cover the light or kill the power to it, since I can't completely turn off the lights. Maybe I need to re-read the instructions again... but I'll figure it out either way. Overall... this is a great floodlight for the price! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: drklbc

customer_reviews.title: Light Failed After First Detection, I fixed a connection and now working.
customer_reviews.text: my original review was "one star" due to the product failing after its first use. Upon removing the light to prepare the return for refund, I noticed one of the pre-wired connectors was loose. I grabbed some black tape, secured the connection and tested again. It worked. So I've canceled my request for refund, though I think they should QA the product more carefully before shipping. To be sure, this was an easy enough DIY fix, but the point is now I had to remove and then reinstall the light. Time is money—and these guys at Hyperikon have wasted mine.
customer_reviews.author: WorldWriter

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well mounted underneath the eave.
customer_reviews.text: Instead of mounting this against a wall, I needed to mount this underneath the eave. I would not recommend it for this purpose, the sensor is difficult to aim and it never has worked right because of it. It does a very inconsistent job of detecting motion to the point of staying on continuously when its windy outside. My neighbors complained and now the sensitivity is turned down all the way. I wouldn't buy it again for my purposes and would look for one that was intended to mount underneath an eave.
customer_reviews.author: Skurj

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few months, then failed.
customer_reviews.text: This was the replacement fixture I was looking for, but the LED Bulbs failed within a few months. I can still hear the sensor working and relays switching, but the bulbs do not turn on. I missed the return window - I will replace with a different brand. I wouldn't purchase this one - while the quality appears to be okay, it just didn't perform for me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Field Tested, A+ Rated
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Hyperikon LED Outdoor Flood Security Lifght with Motion Sensor. The first one has operated so well over the past two years that I have decided to switch out several remaining “old style” security lights with Hyperikon lights. The Hyperikon lights are head-and-shoulders better than anything in the Big Box stores. Hyperikon lights are more stylish, have a smaller profile, output more light, and are much more reliable in sensing activity, etc. In my opinion, the Hyperikon security light is a great value. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ficksette

customer_reviews.title: Lots of light
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light fixture for my in-law's backyard. Installation and setup was reasonably easy and it works reliably. It was mounted under the eaves in a practically horizontal position, and required that I purchase a new outdoor box + extension. As such, it was a bit trick positioning the senor. Vertical mounting would have been easier, but this installation was a retrofit. Ultimately, it worked as expected and my in-laws were happy. It puts out a lot of light, adequately illuminating the intended path.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Leitner

customer_reviews.title: Unit is good if it works but beware of faulty motion sensors.
customer_reviews.text: The motion sensor flood light is well made, sturdy and the light it gives off is power and far reaching but if you're unlucky like me, and it seems many other people who purchased this item, then you may receive a faulty motion detector. The unit that I received could not detect motion beyond 5 or 6 feet even with it set to maximum range so I had to uninstall and return it. There are lot of people with similar issues from the reviews on here so I don't know why this firm doesn't look into it and try to address it especially since the motion sensor is probably the cheaper part of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dennie C

customer_reviews.title: Great light.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this light based on positive reviews. I arrived quickly and is very nice looking and solidly built. I tested it and had a problem with the light just flashing on and off. I called Hyperikon and they were very helpful checking the operation to verify a problem. They sent me a new light in two days and enclosed a label to mail back the first light. This is a very bright light and well made. Lights up when detecting motion and goes off after the set time. I have had good experiences with Hyperikon products before and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: nitpicker

customer_reviews.title: this light is very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: First off, this light is very easy to install. The "in your hand" feel is solid. The 20 watt light is more like a 100 watt standard - very bright. Why then only three starts? After two nights one of the lamps became dim and constantly flickers. This is a defect - stuff happens. I am in process of returning bad unit. I have enough faith in this light to go ahead and order a new replacement. I will update this review as soon as replacement proves worthy of a better endorsement.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Austin

customer_reviews.title: Happily surprised...
customer_reviews.text: Initially not sure about this light but very happily surprised. It is more than bright enough to light our yard and the neighbors yard. Luckily no one has complained as their kitchens are the only rooms lit by the light. The motion sensor is very responsive so much that windy nights it stays on most of the night. I don't mind this as we had "strangers" crossing our yards and has proven to be a very good deterrent. The unit is quite compact and the housing is very durable. So far we had some very windy and rainy nights and no malfunctions the next day or night. I have high hopes it will pass the NY winter.
customer_reviews.author: B Sant

customer_reviews.title: Bold security light
customer_reviews.text: The 5000K color is a little jarring, but that's what you want for a security light. Warm white is 3000K, cool white is 4100K. This is 5000K- which is getting up in the daylight category. It's more rude than relaxing. The two lights are surprisingly directional, far more so than the floodlight fixtures it replaced. So you can aim the vast majority of the light exactly where you want it. (But consider the 3 head light if you want to light a wide area.) It doesn't seem to have any false triggers, but a cat can turn mine on from 40' away and it isn't even turned up all the way. Great light!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hahn

customer_reviews.title: 3rd defective light in a row. Time for a new brand.
customer_reviews.text: I have returned 2 of these and have a 3rd one where the light stays on all night. I really want to like this light as it seems to be well made. It’s all metal and is very bright. The light will come on with motion detection then stay on all night. It goes off once daylight breaks. I would avoid this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: Motion detection pretty useless
customer_reviews.text: The motion detection on these lights is pretty useless. If I turn the motion detector sensitivity up to 90-100% the lights just stay on from dusk till dawn. If I turn it to 80% you have to practically be right under it for it to turn on and even then it takes a second or two. I also find it is more painful to look at than an incandescent bulb that puts out the same amount of light. I've had it for three months and it has otherwise held up fine otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Olso5502

customer_reviews.title: The ground wire is predominantly yellow rather than the usual green
customer_reviews.text: Liked: The light itself seems to be well made for the price, the hardware is included, the brightness is adjustable, the lights can be aimed easily, the mode, on time, and detection distance are easy to adjust. Disliked/could be improved: The gasket to seal the light to the electric box/mounting surface is a thin foam device rather than a more substantial rubber or neoprene gasket, thus necessitating the use of additional sealant
customer_reviews.author: FlyladyAA

customer_reviews.title: A Lot Of Light At A Small Price!
customer_reviews.text: This motion sensing security light is a fantastic buy! Easy to install and works flawlessly. Adjustable lights lets me shine one on my mower storage area and the other on the rest of my back yard. Lights up both areas extremely well. Very pleased with this light. I bought one for my daughters house a year ago and she loved how well it worked also.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Security Light
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different brands of outdoor motion sensor security lights and this Hyperikon seems to have the best potential to provide the features and quality that I was looking for. This is a well made unit with metal fabrication - others I've purchased before are mainly plastic. These lights are very bright, adjustable LEDs so you don't need to replace the bulbs. And finally, the controls are easy to adjust. I have just been using it for a couple of weeks but I certainly buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great light especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great light especially for the price. I am glad that I also ordered the Amazon reccommended outdoor waterproof electrical box. The two items fit nicely together. Installation 9 feet up on side of garage was quick and simple. Total of 30 minutes including the time to get right sized step ladder for 78 year old non-electrician. The controls are great allowing setting on time, motion sensitivity level and daylight sensitivity. So far we have not seen any false motion detection. Will need to wait for a rainy windy night for real test.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: updated review, after about three months of use it stopped working after it rained, when it stopped raining and dried out it worked, the motion detector only works when you move under the light, there is no range to this detector I have a fifty foot drive way and the light does not go on until your under the light. I called CS they're sending a new one, we'll see how that one works.
customer_reviews.author: mIKE

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the two head unit because of the price, warranty and reviews. The unit itself looks very solidly built. Size-wise it is smaller than your typical floodlight security light. In a way I find that to be good because it does not draw attention to it (I bought the white unit and my house has yellow siding.) I had the unit professionally installed by an electrician because I needed an outdoor mounting box, wiring and a switch. So far everything is working well and I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: S. Grabowski

customer_reviews.title: Defective... Light flashes
customer_reviews.text: No good... as other reviewer‘s have stated, after mounting the light it seems to flash on for 10 seconds then off for 10 seconds... I tried cutting the power to the light and waiting a few minutes and turning it back on but now it’s flashing on for 10 minutes off for seven or eight minutes, on for 10 minutes, off for seven or eight minutes...Nothing is tripped the light, no animals/people etc. light is Defective !!
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective motion sensor and light duration timer
customer_reviews.text: The best part of light is it's brightness. The issue I couldn't look past was a very inefficient motion sensor. It trigger at different distances every time and sometimes would not trigger at all with movement. It would also trigger with no movement. I tried to adjust time duration to a few minutes. It seemed like it was 5 seconds or 5 mins not adjustable in-between. Then it never stayed on the same amount of time either when triggered. If I just needed a on and off light this might work but I need a accurate motion sensor for home security.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: No that  bright.
customer_reviews.text: Light fixture was difficult to install on existing box. I installed on the eave in a horizontal position. The light is nowhere near a bright as the one it replaced and the sensitivity is limited because of the mounting position. The motion sensor has a limited vertical movement and points down at its upper limit when installed horizontally.
customer_reviews.author: Spy&Thriller

customer_reviews.title: Adjustment is difficult
customer_reviews.text: Had a really difficult time getting the adjustments where I wanted them. The time that the light stays on after motion sensor is activated isn't consistent. I set a timer and found a variance of one minute thirty seconds to five minutes fifteen seconds. This was without changing any settings and in a very controlled situation. The light itself was easy to install and is plenty bright. I have serious doubts about the quality of the motion sensor.
customer_reviews.author: Tom G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome motion light
customer_reviews.text: Brought this light for front of my condo It worked so well after a month I decided to. Buy one for my neighbor. Now the whole block is lit very bright at night. Love that you can adjust the sensor not to pickup cars passing. Just anybody who steps of driveway..strong metal n looks good.. check out photo
customer_reviews.author: works great

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Security Light..
customer_reviews.text: Installation and photocell adjustments were very easy! And the Hyperikon Led Outdoor Flood Security Light looks very nice and works flawlessly!Once nightime arrived, I walked out onto my back porch to check the operation and brightness of my new security light and I was completely amazed by the amount of light from the led's.My entire backyard was like daylight! So glad I purchased this security light and the price was reasonable! Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Ron F.

customer_reviews.title: Too much light
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Replace Halogens with these babies, and you cannot look at them, they are so darn bright. I put them in my garage and tried to ceiling mount them. The motion detection is no so good I guess because they are ceiling mounted, instead of wall mounted. Doing their job, though.
customer_reviews.author: F. Lum

customer_reviews.title: Cheep junk.  Bought 3 and 1 is dead and 2 malfunctioning.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible lights. I installed them in the front of our house, the sensor won't sense motion until you're right up on it. Then with no motion they trigger on randomly all night. All 3 lights are the same. All the hassle of installing them to find out it's junk. And trust me I tried every varible of sensitivity and so forth. Also, one just died completely... The install was done by a professional electrician, so my wiring is not the issue. Don't buy these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice Replacement Unit
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good.... ordered two and getting ready to install second. Will probably order more since I have a lot of older units (15yr) that have lost one light or are intermittent. OK, I have now ordered a total of six units but reduced rating to 4 stars due to early failure for one unit on day 2. Quickly replaced by Amazon or supplier. My previous units were Hyperikon or the same design and they lasted 15 years. Present units have 5 year warranty. Keeping my fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: jAMES NICHOLAS

customer_reviews.title: Good lights, but a little finicky.
customer_reviews.text: These lights work well, but are a little finicky when it comes to the settings. I purchased two units (one for each rear corner of my garage) and set the settings dials to the EXACT same places. The sensitivity and length of time the light stays on is drastically different for each light. It's not a huge problem, because I've moved the switches bit by bit until I got to the point where they matched up with what I was looking for, but I thought that they would have been more consistent from the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Robbins

customer_reviews.title: 1/3 is defective and strobing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these lights for my home. One of the three strobes when it comes on. Of course, this one is pointed into my back yard and when the wind blows, it looks like I’m having a Halloween party. I am going to have to go and replace this light before my neighbors get fed up with me. This one is obviously defective. The other two are working well as of now. They are brighter than I thought they would be. If they are working, they work great. If they are bad, they are REALLY BAD.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Kung

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great company! I had a problem with the first one I received. The team answered the phone even on a holiday to try and help. After some trouble shooting we determined I may have a defect. Another light was immediately dispatched. This helped a great deal as it was a security light afterall. This was a very helpful company with a great product. I plan to purchase in future and have already told several friend about the very good security led light. Highly recomended!
customer_reviews.author: User #12

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of its limits
customer_reviews.text: First install was very straight forward ,no surprises. Just put it up yesterday so only first impression. #2 VERY bright, and definite plus . This one by far dose the best job for what you brought the light for. #3 easy to adjust with out a lot of tools . Here's the BUT , there is no test mode. so you install but need it dark to really set it up. You can block the sensor but you really need that working to do a proper job.. Know this ahead of time and make your choice with that in mind. I would still buy it again, time will tell as to performance.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Zaccardi

customer_reviews.title: Motion Sensor Performes Horribly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, Very bright when it turns on, but the motion sensor is horrible, no, its HORRIBLE!!!!! Sometimes works when 20 feet away, not much further as advertised, but most times, jumping and waving arms will not activate when even 5 feet away!! I recommend buying something else. If the MFGR sees this and contacts me to resolve I will gladly change my eval. CAN'T RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super bright lights, well constructed and pretty easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty easy to install, and seems to be well made. The LED lights are super bright, which is nice, and you can position the lights in almost infinite ways. Time will tell if it holds up to weather and such. The one thing to watch out for is the cover over the motion sensor is very fragile. Mine was either already cracked when I got it, or I cracked it just installing it (not sure which, but in either case, it's too delicate).
customer_reviews.author: Russel A. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: That is GREAT customer service
customer_reviews.text: When I mounted it, both lights were working. After a while on that same day, one light stopped working. I contacted Hyperikon Co. about the problem and they will send me a new motion sensor in a few days. That is GREAT customer service! A little too early for a light to go out though - on the first day. Also, I turned down the motion detector's sensitivity setting because it was turning on too many times and took a long time to turn off. I'm not sure that adjustment fixed the problem and will observe it more tonight (the one working light on it).
customer_reviews.author: David D

customer_reviews.title: NEEDS TO BE WIRED TO ELECTRICAL
customer_reviews.text: NEEDS TO BE WIRED TO HOUSE. I didnt see it needed to be wired and thought the motion and lights were battery operated. Luckily, we had an old light in the back that needed to be replaced. It is crazy bright! Which would have been perfect for the driveway but very bright for the backyard. My poor attention to detail.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Solid no frills motion sensor, very bright
customer_reviews.text: I'm a licensed electrician with over 25 years experience. I have installed hundreds of motion floods. This one mounts to wall or eave and installs easily. It's a no frills unit, it doesn't have the "dual bright" or other non-essential features that a lot of the Home Depot units offer. That's a plus in my book, less problematic. It's extremely bright, in fact, it lights my entire back yard! All in all seems to be a good product. The only unknown is long term durability as it's still new, but I have no reason to question it at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Installed 5 in summer 2018; ordering 2 more now!
customer_reviews.text: Product works great once you get past the challenges common to all light & motion sensing devices; be careful about pointing sensors directly towards water/glass (light reflects) and trees/other that move in the wind. Lighting is very bright and illuminates walls/doors/other as if it was daylight.
customer_reviews.author: Charley K

customer_reviews.title: Second one is working well.
customer_reviews.text: This review is for a replacement to my original purchase. Nice and bright clear light, but not blinding to the eyes. Good range of motion.Installation was just a 15 minute job. Overall very pleased. My original purchase somehow got water in one of the lenses after only 2 days of being installed. I was contacted by the Hyperikon doing a new purchase follow up on the same day I noticed the problem. After a quick series of emails in under 2 hours a new one was on it's way. Well handled. I've had no problems with this one and we've had some strong rain storms.
customer_reviews.author: John Blaney

customer_reviews.title: Work great and very bright
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these LED motion detector security lights in order to replace my old, failing ones. The installation was fairly easy and basic. I had it installed and running with thirty minutes. The LED is far superior to the old flood light bulbs, with very bright illumination and although I don't know just how long these units will last, right now, they works great. I would definitely recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: jeodee

customer_reviews.title: I dig it.
customer_reviews.text: I had to power wash my wall shortly after installation, and yes, it is waterproof. Motion-detection works great. Does what I need it to do. Bright, but not AGH MY EYES bright. Installation was fast and easy. Won't win any awards for fashion - kinda ugly IMO, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: LG5578

customer_reviews.title: Great quality 👍
customer_reviews.text: Truly recommend this light I bought 2 of them you could adjust the motion also if you want it on during day or night light is nice and clear bright I placed on on the side of my house and will be placing the second one in the back.
customer_reviews.author: jasmin

customer_reviews.title: Ok at first, worthless after short time.
customer_reviews.text: This light was ok at first, although it was extremely sensitive to it's positioning. I could only find one spot where the motion sensor/bulb positioning would allow it to stay on ( not making it think that the sun suddenly came out). I dealt with it this way for about 6 months, then found that one of the bulb (led) areas was completely filled with water. It never had a seal, apparently, so now it does not work at all. On to a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Todd B.

customer_reviews.title: The light works great. It's a bit awkward to install the fixture ...
customer_reviews.text: The light works great. It's a bit awkward to install the fixture on a "eve mount," but I finally got it installed and it works great for my application. The motion detector has very limited up/down range from the eve mount position, so would not work as well if you want to pick up motion more than about 8 feet from the unit. My application is more in need of a left/right detection and this unit works fine for that.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Berger

customer_reviews.title: Arrived USED and DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: Opened box and found that the light had obviously been installed before and it was damaged. UPDATE - Customer service was great! Sent new light with no issues. It’s perfect for my area because I needed some thing that was more directional I wouldn’t throw glare everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: One2th

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: As with all Hyperikon products I have purchased, I am well pleased with this LED security light. Compared to some dusk-to dawn sensors I have purchased, I can tell Hyperikon has paid attention to subtle small details, thus making a superior product. By so doing, they can offer a 5 yr. warranty, the best I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Taxman

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate based on reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to purchase these and explored several other models based on some of the negative reviews. I installed two of these in my driveway over a month ago. Several rain storms later, still no issues. They're very bright and do a great job. Sealed the main box itself with silicone per the instructions. Sounds like those who encountered water leaks were given replacement models without any future issues. Wouldn't hesistste to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: I like to wait a while to post reviews to make sure item works. This fixture was easy to install, puts out quite a bit of light and is sensitive enough that our dachshund can turn it on while traveling around the yard. We live in the country, with deer, fox, porcupine, etc. I like that I can see him and whatever else might be out there.
customer_reviews.author: Honest responses

customer_reviews.title: 5-year Warranty, great sensor lights!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these in November 2016, and a few weeks ago one of the lights in one of the units failed. I contacted the company through Amazon, and I was pleased to find out that they have a 5-year Warranty. They shipped me out a replacement, at no charge, immediately, and it is the newest model!! Great product, FANTASTIC SERVICE!!
customer_reviews.author: Bracken

customer_reviews.title: The light is a great price. Lowe's and Home Depot could never come ...
customer_reviews.text: This lights rocks . I have 3 now . Strong bright light with lots of different ways to mount it . The light is a great price . Lowe's and Home Depot could never come close to the quality of this light with a great price I bought some lights from Home Depot and they were three times the price I'm very happy and I bought several of these lights for multiple different properties I have three at my house alone They're nice and bright and turn on just the way you want them to at night
customer_reviews.author: Devon S.

customer_reviews.title: It stays on all night
customer_reviews.text: It stays on all night ... I notified the company and they offered to replace it, but I'm 70 years old and did not want to climb back up the ladder to take it down. Their great customer service refunded my purchase price. The light is still up there where I installed it and it still comes on all night.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Good when it worked
customer_reviews.text: Hey, how do I get a replacement bulb for this? There's a 5 years limited warranty and I've had this for around 16 months and one of the bulbs is dead. The motion sensor is also not working now; the one remaining bulb always stays on. I would give this one or 2 more stars if the reliability is there. Hey manufacturer, please give me the info on how to get my LED bulb replaced (if possible). I gotta check out the motion sensor unit also because it's always staying on.
customer_reviews.author: bargainhunter

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, very bright with many adjustments possible. Only problem is that even when you're moving around in the dark it sometimes goes out after a certain amount of time. wish there was an easy switch to have it stay on when you want instead of having to open it to adjust the settings
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: If you have a problem customer service will help you
customer_reviews.text: I love that is light is bright and really lights up my front porch area, I have it set to come on as a motion light from dusk to dawn. It does a good job. After being installed one month one of the lights has quit working. I called Hyperikon customer service, they are sending out a new light with 3 days. I am giving 5 stars because of the quality of the light and the excellent customer service. If there are anymore problems I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: advilla

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation, full bright light coverage, great support
customer_reviews.text: Lights installed easily, I had to loosen and turn sensor module 180 degrees to mount under eves. Set to Dusk to Dawn which works well lighting my drive way and two areas of my back yard. This is the 3rd of these units i purchased. The first unit did not work properly on dusk to dawn setting due to bad photo cell. Hyperikon immediately replaced the unit within 2 days. Great support.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The light has good brightness and seem well made. I would like a test mode to align the motion sensor during the day. My light is mounted about 20 feet above ground and the yard slopes down so it is difficult to get full coverage, but it does sense motion in various locations but not everywhere. It works as well as my previous light. I am still adjusting the sensor to try to get better coverage.
customer_reviews.author: GoSeattle

customer_reviews.title: Motion Detector not great
customer_reviews.text: Once you can get the motion detector to go on, the lights are great. I've had it for 1 year now. However, I have to stand there and wave to get it to come on. It does not regularly trigger when I ride my bicycle down the driveway, and often not when I drive the car past (only comes on after the car is past), even though detector is pointed in the direction you're coming from. I while likely swap this out for a different brand with a better motion detection.
customer_reviews.author: benzor

customer_reviews.title: Love the bright white light
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright white light. I mounted it under an eave, because that's where my prior light was mounted. The motion-detector portion will not swivel out far enough to use that feature (it would only work if someone was walking right under the light), but the dusk-to-dawn sensor does work, so it just means the light is on all night. Since it uses little energy, I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: L Warnecke

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bright, energy efficient, and effective motion sensing. We have had it for just over a year installed near our back door. It is quite bright so I have one of the lights pointed away from the sidewalk and one pointed at the ceiling of the porch so as not to blind people. We have tried a few lights in this location and this is the best yet.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sandvig

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: We had our electrician installed these around the perimeter of our home; they're hard-wired into the electrical. AMAZING lighting and you can adjust the automation settings. We have had them for over a year and absolutely recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: not very bright
customer_reviews.text: they're to dim to project out very far so when I angle them down to at least illuminate their range of brighteness then the light interferes with the infrared and motion function. not very happy with them. I will just use them for manually switching on and off, bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Marvin James

customer_reviews.title: ... installed three of these and they have been working fine last few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and installed three of these and they have been working fine last few weeks. They give off good bit of light, but our yard only extends about 15 feet. Would have given 5 stars, but they were a little hard to install due wires, etc. pushing on and deforming the rubber seal. This made it difficult to align the seal along with the fact the round electrical housing didn't align perfectly with the lights circular mounting. If they increased the seal 1/4" in diameter it would have made installation a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Config Man

customer_reviews.title: FAILED AFTER SIX MONTHS !
customer_reviews.text: Had this light 6 mths. Just found on side of the light not working and found lens filled with water after a heavy rain. Now what ? Out of warranty and will have to replace the security light again. Would not recommend this light due to failure to seal water out for a light the is supposed to be designed for the elements. Otherwise light was working great. As an update to this posting. The company has responded to my feedback by sending me a replacement ,which arrived quickly,free of charge. It is great to see customer service stand behind their product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Price

customer_reviews.title: Very bright light.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Like the brightness and the fact it will turn off automatically during daylight hours. Hard to adjust the sensitivity and time on the motion mode as movement of trees and bushes will trigger it on.
customer_reviews.author: Willeecue

product_meta.title: Hyperikon LED Security Light with Motion Sensor, 2 Head Dusk to Dawn, 20 Watts, UL Listed, White
feature_bullets: SAVE 80% INSTANTLY - Cut down your electricity bill by up to 80% by replacing 100W with 20W!
45,000 HOUR LIFETIME - With an astonishing life rating of 45,000 hours, or 21 years with 6 hrs/day of use, replacing your bulbs is now a thing of the past.

LIGHTS AUTOMATICALLY - The corded electric LED Security Light makes the installation easy and hassle-free. Simply choose your preferred location for the LED Security Light, hang it up and wire it to light it on. Built-in motion/dusk-to-dawn sensors take the work out of your hands, sensing light levels and motion with a range of 150 degrees and out to 50 feet.

FULLY WEATHERPROOFED - IP65 waterproof rating ensures that your fixture won’t give in to the elements. Rain, sleet or snow, the Hyperikon Security Light fixture can handle it. Hyperikon LED Security Lights are ideal for garages, workshops, industrial workstations, storage rooms, equipment rooms and other close task and large area lighting requirements.

5 YEAR WARRANTY - When we say we've got you covered, we mean it. Should your product fail within the first 5 years from the date of purchase we will fulfill our promise and replace it free of charge to you.
